text: TV Simić or is a local commercial television channel based in Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina. The program is mainly produced in Serbian language. TV station was established in 1996. TV Simić reports on local events in Banja Luka, Republika Srpska entity and BiH. == References == == External links == * www.tvsimic.com * Communications Regulatory Agency of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Mass media in Banja Luka Category:Television stations in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Television channels and stations established in 1996
title: TV Simić
